title: Junior Copywriter
content:
About Ogilvy
Ogilvy has been the “teaching hospital” for brands since the company was founded by David Ogilvy in 1948. We continue that brand building legacy today through Borderless Creativity – operating, innovating, and creating at the intersection of talent and capabilities. Our experts in Consulting, Advertising, Experience, Public Relations and Health work fluidly across 131 offices in 93 countries.Ogilvy has been operating in Vietnam for over 25 years and has played a leading role in helping to shape the marketing communications industry in Vietnam today. We remain committed to continuing this legacy and are on a mission to help create the next generation of hybrid and fluid modern-marketing talent by making Ogilvy the “Best Place to Work” in Vietnam for GenZ by 2025.
Ogilvy Group is looking for a talented Junior Copywriter to join our team. You will report directly to the Associate Creative Director and work closely with Art Directors and Designers to deliver the best work to our clients.
Key Responsibilities

Receive and discuss briefs on jobs from/with Client Service.
Generate ideas after understanding the requirements.
Create and produce efficient creative solutions, based on the agreed project brief in a timely and cost-effective manner.
Responsible for the day-to-day activities associated with the creative team.
Daily review of job status with the Creative Supervisor.
Work with the Creative team to deliver high standards of finished work.
Co-ordinate with all the departments (Client Service/ Studio/ Production,…)
Review and make sure to complete and checked all tasks as required by internally.
Ensure close collaboration with the Client Service team to guarantee client satisfaction.

Qualifications

1 year of experience working in multiple integrated advertising campaigns (both ATL & digital) from start to finish.
Excellent writing and speaking skills in both English & Vietnamese
Digital (especially TikTok) and trends savvy. 
Independent, self-motivated, hard-working, & able to work independently both effectively and efficiently, as well as teamwork with partners.
Creative oriented & solution oriented.
Great attention to detail.
Proactively seek out opportunities to add further ideas and value to projects.
Honest, energetic, empathetic and passionate.
Open to new experiences
A portfolio or referenced work is required for this position







At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
